description: Check out your favorites, add notes, and follow trends to learn words you don't know.

trends.title: Trends
trends.description: Trends show the words that other users have learned the most.

notes.title: Notes
notes.description: Notes create a space where you can save words you want to review later.

followed_results.title: Followed Results
followed_results.description: You can see the word lists you are following.

streamers.title: Streamers
streamers.description: You can schedule a lesson with teachers for the language you want to practice.

pricing.title: Buy Tokens
pricing.description: Purchase tokens to enhance your language learning experience on Vocapedia. Secure payment with instant token delivery.
